course_title: Research Topics in Political Science: Imagining Democracy
class_notes:
(Same as AAS 385 6)
(This is the second part of a two-part course. Students will have internships at civic organizations based on the work completed during Fall 2023 in the Imagining Democracy Lab.)
(Students must have taken and satisfactorily completed the course in FS 2023)
course_description: Research on selected topics and problems in political science. Class will fulfill the "research" requirement for the political science major. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
prerequisites: POLS 208 or POLS_OX 208 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4545, Section #: 3, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 11:30a-2:15p, Instructor: Anderson/Fraga, Status: Closed
